title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the functional and non-functional requirements for the PrivacyGuardian system, including the specific privacy regulations to be supported, data sources to be monitored, and desired monitoring capabilities.

title: Design System Architecture for PrivacyGuardian
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flows, and interactions. The architecture should consider scalability, fault tolerance, security, and compliance with relevant privacy regulations. Additionally, include design patterns for handling sensitive data and privacy-preserving machine learning techniques, and make sure to incorporate modern AI principles like federated learning and differential privacy. Also, consider the potential need for real-time monitoring and alerting systems.

title: Develop Data Ingestion and Processing Pipeline
description: Implement the necessary components to ingest and process data from various sources, including data transformation, normalization, and enrichment.

title: Implement Privacy Compliance Rules Engine
description: Develop the rules engine responsible for evaluating data usage against privacy regulations and identifying potential violations.

title: Build User Interface and Reporting
description: Design and implement the user interface and reporting capabilities to provide visibility into data flows, usage, and compliance violations.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Develop and integrate security measures, such as authentication, authorization, and data encryption, to ensure the system's security and protect sensitive data.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the PrivacyGuardian system.

title: Develop Test Suite and Quality Assurance Plan
description: Create a comprehensive test suite and quality assurance plan to ensure the system's functionality, performance, and compliance with privacy regulations.

title: Prepare Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop detailed documentation, including system architecture diagrams, API references, and user guides, to support the deployment and operation of the PrivacyGuardian system.
